titleStmt.title: An elegy on the death of that learned, pious, and famous divine, Doctor John Ovven, who dyed the 24th. of August, 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Janeway, in Queens-Head Alley, in Pater-Noster-Row.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "HOw came't to pass that none did Silence ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
